data.name: Panel_GroundSpeed

data.comment: Above Ground Level altitude display panel header (ICAO standard abbreviation)

data.name: Joystick_PressAnyButton
data.value: Appuyez sur n'importe quel bouton du joystick...
data.comment: Overlay message when waiting for joystick button press

data.name: Joystick_ButtonCaptured
data.comment: Success message after capturing joystick button. {0} is the button number

data.name: Menu_Display_GroundSpeed
data.comment: Toggle ground speed display visibility (ICAO standard)

data.name: Menu_Display_GlideSlope
data.comment: Toggle glide slope display visibility (ICAO standard)

data.name: Menu_Joystick_NoDevices
data.comment: Message when no joystick devices are detected

data.comment: Message shown when trying to configure button without selecting device

data.name: Menu_Joystick_ButtonConfigured
data.comment: Menu item showing configured button number. {0} is the button number

data.name: Menu_Joystick_ChangeButton
data.comment: Submenu option to change configured button

data.name: Menu_Joystick_ClearButton
data.comment: Submenu option to clear configured button

data.name: Menu_TorqueLimiter_Enable
data.comment: Toggle to enable/disable torque limiter feature

data.name: Menu_TorqueLimiter_MaxTorque
data.comment: Maximum torque percentage setting. {0} is the percentage value

data.name: Menu_TorqueLimiter_WarningThreshold
data.comment: Warning threshold percentage setting. {0} is the percentage value

data.name: Menu_TorqueLimiter_ReductionAggression
data.comment: Throttle reduction aggression multiplier setting. {0:F2} is the decimal value formatted to 2 decimal places

data.name: Menu_TorqueLimiter_MinThrottle
data.comment: Minimum throttle percentage setting. {0} is the percentage value

data.name: Menu_TorqueLimiter_Cooldown
data.comment: Intervention cooldown time in milliseconds. {0} is the millisecond value

data.name: Menu_TorqueLimiter_Interventions
data.comment: Number of throttle interventions performed. {0} is the count

data.name: Menu_Units_Speed_KMH
data.comment: Kilometers per hour speed unit option

data.name: Menu_Units_Speed_MPH
data.comment: Miles per hour speed unit option

data.name: Dialog_MaxTorque_Title
data.comment: Title for max torque configuration dialog

data.name: Dialog_MaxTorque_Prompt
data.value:
Entrez la limite de couple maximale en pourcentage du maximum nominal :
Actuel : {0}%
Valeurs courantes : ‚Ä¢ 100% = Maximum nominal (ligne rouge) ‚Ä¢ 95% = Limite prudente ‚Ä¢ 90% = Fonctionnement continu s√ªr ‚Ä¢ 105% = Autoriser de br√®ves excursions au-del√† de la ligne rouge
data.comment: Prompt for max torque configuration. {0} is the current value

data.name: Dialog_WarningThreshold_Title
data.comment: Title for warning threshold configuration dialog

data.name: Dialog_WarningThreshold_Prompt
data.value:
Entrez le seuil d'avertissement (couleur jaune) en pourcentage :
Actuel : {0}%
C'est le moment o√π les barres deviennent jaunes avant d'atteindre la limite rouge. Typique : 90-95%
data.comment: Prompt for warning threshold configuration. {0} is the current value

data.name: Dialog_ReductionAggression_Title
data.comment: Title for reduction aggression configuration dialog

data.name: Dialog_ReductionAggression_Prompt
data.value:
Entrez le multiplicateur d'agressivit√© de r√©duction des gaz :
Actuel : {0:F2}
Fonctionnement : ‚Ä¢ 8% de surcouple √ó 2,5x = 20% de r√©duction des gaz ‚Ä¢ Plus √©lev√© = r√©ductions plus agressives ‚Ä¢ Plus bas = r√©ductions plus douces
Plage typique : 1,5 - 4,0
data.comment: Prompt for reduction aggression configuration. {0:F2} is the current value formatted to 2 decimals

data.name: Dialog_MinThrottle_Title
data.comment: Title for minimum throttle configuration dialog

data.name: Dialog_MinThrottle_Prompt
data.value:
Entrez le plancher minimum des gaz (limite de s√©curit√©) :
Actuel : {0}%
Le syst√®me ne r√©duira jamais les gaz en dessous de cette valeur pour √©viter le d√©crochage. Typique : 30-50%
data.comment: Prompt for minimum throttle configuration. {0} is the current value

data.name: Dialog_Cooldown_Title
data.comment: Title for intervention cooldown configuration dialog

data.name: Dialog_Cooldown_Prompt
data.value:
Entrez le temps entre les interventions sur les gaz (millisecondes) :
Actuel : {0}ms
Cela permet au moteur/h√©lice de se stabiliser entre les corrections. Recommand√© : ‚Ä¢ 1000ms (1 sec) = r√©ponse rapide ‚Ä¢ 2000ms (2 sec) = √©quilibr√© ‚Ä¢ 3000ms (3 sec) = conservateur
data.comment: Prompt for intervention cooldown configuration. {0} is the current value
